Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11000. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
